name: Dog Hotel Tycoon
description:
Build your own Dog Hotel and create a paradise for dogs! Take care of your dog guests, pet them, play with them, and take them to Dog Talent Shows!


CREATE A WORLD FOR YOUR DOG GUESTS TO ENJOY!

Start with a small dog hotel in a suburban area, and improve it to become the first 5+ star dog hotel! Create spaces for your dogs to take naps, eat delicious snacks, play with each other, swim, excercise and much more! Anything to ensure the satisfaction of your dog guests!


WELCOME DOGS FROM ALL AROUND THE WORLD!

Grow your dog hotel and accept more breeds as your capacity increases. Each and every single dog will have their own unique character, behavior, wants and needs; and it is up to you to satisfy them!


CREATE YOUR OWN DOG

Create your own dogs, and add them as permanent residents to the hotel! Pick their breed, set their age, give them some character traits and your dogs will be the first to great you at the hotel every day!


DAILY DOG SHOW

Take your favourite dogs from the hotel to a special daily event; the Dog Show! Each day, your dog guests will be able to take part in a brand new challenge, which might consist of physical contests like a running or a jumping tournament; or it can be more creative challenges like a singing or a dancing tournament!


DAILY DOG TRIVIA

Test your knowledge of dogs and learn interesting facts about our four-legged friends with this daily trivia quiz.


BUILD STATUES OF ICONIC DOGS

Dog Hotel Tycoon has an icon's corner called "Paws of Fame" that celebrates the iconic dogs from history and their stories. Here, players can build statues of these dogs and learn about what made them special.


FEATURES

- Easy to play game for every animal lover!
- Cute dogs with unique characteristics and lifelike behavior!
- More than 80 dogs to have as guests, and more to come!
- Fun rooms and items for your dogs to enjoy!
- Amazing side activities to keep you busy while your hotel keeps growing!


If you love dogs, you will love Dog Hotel Tycoon.

This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. If you are having any issues with the game or have any feedback, you can always reach us at support@filgames.com
